service_page.description1: Most of the time, contractual documents contains a header, a footer, navigation menus, possibly adsâ€¦ We aim at tracking only the significant parts of the document. In order to achieve that, you will have to select the part of the documents that contains the relevant part and remove the insignificant parts.
